title: Black Chancery, Permissions
content:
I wish to use Black Chancery for my correspondence and for posting. Anyone know the whereabouts of the owner?

Thanks for the help.

Spence
author: Spence

comments.content: The font Black Chancery when Googled says it is a free font (available from several sources) and that font says it is in the public domain when opened opened in Font Lab.

Thanks Bojev!

Merry Christmas to you and yours.!
